== Main inclusion report for libnfsidmap ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/libn/libnfsidmap/, compiled on all arches.

2. ''Rationale:'' New build dependency of `nfs-utils` which is already in main.

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.
* The package is very young, so there is no real security history yet.
* No security relevant binaries.
* Checked source for most common pitfalls (array access, str...() calls, sprint() calls), no obvious flaws.

4. ''QA:''
* Installation: only a library, no end user tool.
* Bugs: no relevant Debian bugs, no upstream bug tracker
* No special hardware interaction.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard `debhelper` packaging.
* FHS met.
* Debian package and library policy met.
